events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Software Engineering department based on your background and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out shortly to discuss the next steps.
The initial screening interview with our HR specialist went well, and you demonstrated strong knowledge in software development principles.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm following the initial screening; we appreciate your engagement.
We have scheduled your technical interview with the lead developer for next Monday at 2 PM UTC; please confirm your availability.
